items.title: MMA Gloves  UFC Gloves for Men & Women
items.description: Liberlupus - To Explore Your PowerLiberlupus is a company specializing in boxing products  integrating independent design  production and sales. We are always committed to researching and meeting the needs of boxers. Boxing is a sport of exploring strength. In the process of exploring and releasing of power  the appeal and control brought by boxing is of great value. Liberlupus loves and respects boxing  designs the products that boxers need most  and definitely puts product quality in the first place.Clean Tips:1.Preferred washed by hand. You only need to soak the gloves with soap  then rub and wash  dry it in the shade.2.Never use hot water  bleach and other strong acid wash  and do not bask in the sun  because the material organization will be destroyed easily  which will cause pilling  fabric loose and gloves deformation and so on.Note:If your not thrilled  simply contact our reliable customer service team and you will receive unmatched personal assistance.
